trends: There have been no other sightings in kings
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsMy wife,son and I were coming home from my aunts house in VA. who is very Ill and was near our home when we saw an orange light high in the sky.We were traveling west on reservoir rd and the object was west north west ofreservoir rd over bays mnt. about 6 miles from interstate 26 . as we got closer and under it ,we could see a triangle shape with 3 orange lights ,one on each corner with a small red light and a white strobe.It stayed in the same position and never moved. we kept driveing and I wathed it till we went out of site of it. My wife would not stop and I didn't have have my camera with me.
Summary: 3 orange lights with a red blinking and white strobe
